ygData.subject: RE: Level 11 Spell - Cinda Charismatic Carrillion (sp)
ygData.msgSnippet: On another side note, whip out that flute and try it if you hae the skill maxed.  It does add to this song s effect.  Not sure how much but without flute I was
ygData.messageBody:
On another side note, whip out that flute and try it if you hae the skill
maxed. It does add to this song's effect. Not sure how much but without
flute I was able to go from apprehensive to indifferent on a merchant in
Erudin. With the flute it popped up to amiable. I was also able to get the
bard guild members in Qeynos up to warmly from kindly, but only with the
flute. On a sadder note, I am now so far into Dubious with the Corrupt
Guards of Qeynos that I cannot get them up to apprehensive, even with a
flute. The Freeport Militia still boosts to apprehensive without, or
indifferent with a flute. At this rate I will soon be KoS in every city on
Antonica save Rivervale, Sigh. At least I will be able to hold off the
inevitable by doin' that flute dance for a while yet.

Kitasi the really nervous about binding only in cities

-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 1:25 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Level 11 Spell - Cinda Charismatic Carrillion
(sp)


From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>

It has the power to heal you. +80hp (I think) One charge then you need to
get a new one or recharge the one you got.

Sylly

p.s. I bet one more set of 4 warbeads and I will be one with the wall...
p.s.s. ok, maybe just one more set of 4...

-----Original Message-----
From: David Knadler [mailto:dknadler@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 1:58 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Level 11 Spell - Cinda
Charismatic Carrillion (sp)
Importance: Low

From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>

Pardon my ignorance, but what exactly does the Squad Ring
do? I'm assuming
it's a good thing for Bards to have?

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 28 Bard (Povar)

-----Original Message-----
From: Operaman [mailto:slider@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 12:25 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Level 11 Spell - Cinda Charismatic
Carrillion
(sp)


From: "Operaman" <slider@...>

>
> They changed it when they made the ring no-drop. You no
> longer get a faction hit for getting the ring, nor do you
get

Actually, I distinctly remember getting a GuardiansoftheVale
faction hit
when I got the ring (It was just yesterday evening, so even
my swiss-cheese
memory recalls it).

> a faction increase for recharging it. So unless you do
> something to lower your faction with GuardiansoftheVale,
if
> you should accidently give your ring to Hendri before
singing
> your song and she won't give it back, you can just go back
to
> the marshall and get another ring.


Whether I get it recharged or get a new one is unimportant
as long as I
don't have to cause two more species' extinction to do it! :
D


Operaman
Meandering Maestro
Innoruuk
